title: Flipkart starts its ‘The Big Billion Days’ mega sale with Fashion Category; up to 80% discounts on offer
text:
Flipkart , India largest online marketplace is all set to kick-off the five day ‘The Big Billion Days’ mega sale with its fashion category – offers are open till the 17 th of October 2015. During the Flipkart offer, customers can shop from a wide range of apparel, footwear accessories (sunglasses, watches, perfumes, bags, belts, etc). With one of the widest range of fashion products on offer, customers during the sale can expect discounts ranging from 50% – 80% on a large variety of global domestic fashion brands.
This year, along with Flipkart’s extensive collection, Myntra joins the five-day sale making the fashion selection bigger and discounts deeper for customers shopping during ‘The Big Billion Days’ mega sale. Be it a pair of premium French Connection jeans, a Wildcraft bag or a pair of RayBan sunglasses, customers will see an assortment of goods on sale. Here is a sample:
Top fashion brands on sale:
United Colours of Benetton | Steve Madden | Diesel | Clarks | Catwalk | Pantaloons | Adidas | Kenneth Cole Reaction | Tresmode | French Connection | Dressberry | People | Superdry
Here are a few top deals and offers to watch out for during the Flipkart ‘The Big Billion Days’ sale:
Apart from the massive discounts, shoppers using select debit and credit cards can get a 10% cash back on purchases. Users of State Bank of India debit and credit cards can avail this additional benefit on shopping with their cards.
Flipkart’s ‘The Big Billion Days’ offer was launched at midnight (12:00 am on 13 th October 2015), opening with the fashion sale that will run for the next five days, until seller stocks last. Following the fashion category would be Home and Appliances categories, which will start on the 14 th .
